name: Forma 36 UI Kit
description:
Forma 36 is the open source design system of Contentful. This UI Kit represents Forma 36 React components, including typography and colors.


Variants

Easy to select different states and options, e.g. active or disabled, small versions of components, buttons with or without icons, with or without a draggable indicator.


Auto Layout

Simple components with text, like Button or Pill, use Auto Layout. Some bigger components like Modal use it too, but only for the very basic use case. For more complex scenarios feel free to detach the component and work without using Auto Layout.


Styles

Forma 36 tokens such as font styles, colors, and shadow effects are represented as Figma styles.


Interactive components

Enjoy the full benefit of interactivity by turning interactive components on in your project.
